title: Databridge
description: This is a data exchange platform to support bi-directional data exchange among multi-cloud services in security manner.
details: Support an average data throughput of 1000+ tps, with peak loads of 5000+ tps.
Highly configurable to support different usecases.
24/7 monitoring with real-time alerts and KPI tracking.

title: Integration Activity Service
description: This is a RESTful API services to support data integration.
details: RESTful web service to standardize data Integration.
Using DynamoDB to handle high I/O throughput and large-scale capacity.
24/7 monitoring with real-time alerts and KPI tracking.

title: Banking 3.0
description: This project redesigns the data flow in the banking domain, transitioning from microservices to a data pipeline architecture.
details: Break down the old system's functionality into distinct pipelines and processors.
Generate processors pools to adapt different use cases.
24/7 monitoring with real-time alerts and KPI tracking.

title: Mobile Media Processor
description: This backend service stores mobile media data in AWS RDS and generates summary reports for business intelligence.
details: A highly scalable service that processes mobile media data for multiple customers.
Provide customized reports based on business needs.
24/7 monitoring with real-time alerts and KPI tracking.
